Articles.Content:
Salutations!

This is similar to the old \'Rants\' page.

Here, put things that annoy you, and either end them with

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-

or more simply:

F7U12 (7 F\'s and 12 U\'s)

I\'ll start.

For my birthday when I was little, I was given the LEGO \'Mission to Mars\' playset, which came with a Delta II rocket, the Oddysey probe, and a tiny Mars Rover. KSP, which I found this year, sparked my interest in space. I looked up the set on eBay:

Lowest Price: $234.53

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-

Your turn!

When I was 12, I saw a rock \'em sock \'em robot \'make it yourself\' kit. I bought it and went home. Turns out it was a barbie honeymoon kit. And I\'m 49 now.

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-

Relating to the OP\'s post about Lego, when I was younger my Mars Mission diamond driller was torn to pieces and thrown down holes in the floorboard by my Brother. :-\

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-

A certain set of Lego tires and hubs that I want will either cost me $70 apiece on Ebay, or 75$ for the entire set on Bricklink.

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-

Came down to the computer to find my sister\'s friend walking away and Chrome exited.

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-

Speeches, riches, and bitches

F^120U^200

I\'ve found a good robotics kit. Minimal price - over 9000$

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-

I\'ve found a good robotics kit. Minimal price - over 9000$

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-

lol. its over 9000. anyway:

devote 2 and 1/2 years to a girl who publicly humiliates me infront of all of my mates and people i dont know

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU

Someone (Aliv3) gave me KSP for free on my birthday, wich is also the release date of KSP 0.14

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU YEAHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!111

Someone (Aliv3) gave me KSP for free on my birthday, wich is also the release date of KSP 0.14

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU YEAHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!111

Correction:

Aliv3 cracked 0.14 and uploaded it to a site like mediafire. FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU cking noob

To be clear: I did not download 0.14 from the crack, and I won\'t ever do that.

Someone (Aliv3) gave me KSP for free on my birthday, wich is also the release date of KSP 0.14

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU YEAHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!111

That\'s not what your signature says...

FFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-

That\'s not what your signature says...

FFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-

That was before Aliv3 send me the crack. HarvesteR gave me KSP for reporting the cracker. He was pretty disappointed that a guy who was on the forums did that.

Wake up and can\'t find your glasses

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU

Want to post a good one, but my life is perfectly fine.

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU

Find your glasses 5 hours later in the most obvious spot possible.

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU

Take an hour setting up your hard drive and stuff to dual boot Windows 8. Windows 8 tells you it does not like your hardware.

FFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-

Windows 7 & 8

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-

talk to some guy and say you have windows 7, he responds'dang that must be old as heck i got windows 95!'

more of a FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCCCCCCCCC

talk to some guy and say you have windows 7, he responds'dang that must be old as heck i got windows 95!'

more of a FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCCCCCCCCC

EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE palm.

Manage to land BACE Habitation right next to BACE Solar Unit on a nice bit of the Mun.

Habitation tips over and explodes.

FFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUU-

I buy a game so I can play coop with two of my friends, to find out that its only two player (they had told me it was three player). I go to play coop (I don\'t like the single player of the game) to find that it doesn\'t connect to coop servers.

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU-

Spend 4 mnths constantly paying $30 for 750Mb of wireless credit only to find out yesterday that $40 gets 3GB!!

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU
